titles.title: TREAT Act
TREAT Act
Treatment Restoration for Every American's Trial Act
A bill to prohibit the Secretary of Health and Human Services from restricting direct access by health care facilities to medical countermeasures.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Treatment Restoration for Every American's Trial Act or the TREAT Act
This bill prohibits the Department of Health and Human Services from implementing any policy that restricts a hospital or other health care facility from procuring medical countermeasures directly from the manufacturers or distributors.
